channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: To Meet Electric Vehicle Goals, California Must Spend $20 Billion on Grid Updates
Biden pressured to sanction China for role in US fentanyl crisis
item.description: Rep. Jim Banks is unveiling new legislation to force the Biden administration to severely hike penalties against China and its allied actors over the U.S. fentanyl crisis.

item.title: Conservative Group Fights WH Student Loan Push
item.description: Heritage Action, the advocacy arm of the conservative Heritage Foundation think tank, has launched a campaign seeking comments on President Joe Biden's attempt to cancel student loans.

item.title: UPDATE: Photojournalist Arrested During University of Texas Protest Is Now Facing New Assault Charges
Biden calls Japan 'xenophobic' for not accepting many immigrants, compares to China, Russia
item.description: President Biden called the allied nation of Japan "xenophobic" during a speech on Wednesday, comparing the island country to rival powers China and Russia.

item.title: Sen. Joni Ernst Presses Biden to Halt Gazan Refugee Proposal
item.description: Sen. Jon Ernst, R-Iowa., sent a letter to President Joe Biden on Wednesday demanding his administration halt their proposed plan to accept Gazan refuges into the United States.

item.title: 'Morning Joe' Mika Has a Meltdown When Al Sharpton Compares Campus Riots to Jan. 6
President Biden condemns violent anti-Israel protests, won't call up National Guard
item.description: President Biden has broken his silence Thursday regarding the anti-Israel demonstrations that are roiling colleges and universities around the nation.

item.title: GOP Lawmakers Introducing Bill Aimed at Fauci
item.description: House Republicans are reportedly ready to introduce a bill prohibiting past health officials from profiting off medical research - a move aimed directly at former National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases head Anthony Fauci.

item.title: Boeing Whistleblower Dies Suddenly After Exposing Problems With Manufacturing Practices
Trump slams 'radical left lunatics' creating chaos on college campuses nationwide
item.description: Former President Trump slammed the "radical left lunatics" on college campuses nationwide for creating chaos amid their protests against Israel.

item.title: Drea de Matteo to Newsmax: Dream Government 'Might Not Exist'
item.description: Actress Drea de Matteo told Newsmax on Thursday that she'll always consider herself far left, but she's feeling "more aligned" with conservative values

item.title: MSNBC Says Antisemitic, Pro-Hamas Demonstrators Aren't the Problem â€” It's 'Bad Faith' Republicans!
Anti-McCarthy GOP rebels distance themselves from push to oust Speaker Johnson
item.description: Seven of the eight House Republicans who ousted ex House Speaker Kevin McCarthy are still serving in Congress, and nearly all of them are outright opposed to ousting House Speaker Mike Johnson right now.

item.title: Sen. Barrasso Demands Dismissal of University Leaders
item.description: Sen. John Barrasso, R-Wyo., called for the dismissal of college administrators over their handling of the pro-Palestine protests on campuses nationwide, many of which have resulted in arrests and violent clashes with police.
